description:
She is a "Valentine," a life form created in the image of humanity. She once lacked emotions and followed orders to exterminate humanity, her encounters with Sin and Elphelt changed her. By her own choice, she abandoned her mission. Now, she leads the Illyrian United Kingdom`s Special Forces Brigade, taking on covert missions that the military can`t address openly.
Source: Official page
name: Ramlethal Valentine
